title: BBC Space Chimp Ham DVB XviD MP3
description:
BBC Natural World - Spacechimp (2008)


Information

First Aired: Fri 22 Feb 2008, 8.00pm BBC Two
Ep 8/8, Winter Season, 2008

January 31, 1961: a Mercury rocket lifts off from Cape Canaveral. The astronaut on board is a three-year-old chimpanzee named Ham. The young chimp is shot into the stratosphere before splashing back down in the Atlantic Ocean. He is thus the first &#039;earthling&#039; to come back alive from space.

This drama tells the famous chimp&#039;s remarkable story, based on reconstructions of events surrounding the mission and footage shot by NASA at the time.

Release Notes
o This is the last episode of NW of Winter 2008.
o Source is grainy - so i left those grains (except the noises). Also contains lots of archive footage which are in poorer conditions.
o source stream is a mixture of different resolution sequneces (without blackbars). So some sequences have black bars on lhs and rhs of the screen.
